channel.title: Migrating to Qube-Whonix only hardware
channel.description: Designating a laptop for Whonix (Qubes-Whonix) use is recommended. Would there be any benefit to building all new templates for new Whonix hardware [https://www.qubes-os.org/doc/building-whonix-template/](https://www.qubes-os.org/doc/building-whonix-template/)? Meaning migrating from a combined clearnet + Whonix hardware.

item.title: Migrating to Qube-Whonix only hardware
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Apart from learning experience not much. Qubes-Whonix templates are build by installing from official, remote Whonix binary repository deb.whonix.org…

https://github.com/Whonix/qubes-template-whonix/blob/master/whonix-gateway/04_install_qubes_post.sh

…unless creating your own Whonix binary repository by configuring variables

  • whonix_repository_apt_line
  • whonix_signing_key_file

And then also upgrading Whonix from source code rather than Whonix binary repository.

Whonix

Dev/Build Documentation/Upgrading Whonix Deb Packages from Source Code

HowTo: Upgrade Whonix ™ Deb Packages from Source Code

Read full topic
